name: digitalocean
title: DigitalOcean
description: Quickly find resources in your DigitalOcean team
author: shukantpal

commands.name: search-container-registry
commands.title: Search Container Registry
commands.subtitle: DigitalOcean
commands.description:
Search for images in your container registry on DigitalOcean, and open the repository in the DigitalOcean console.

Moreover, you can browse the tags of the selected repository and copy them.

commands.name: search-databases
commands.title: Search Databases
commands.subtitle: DigitalOcean
commands.description: Search for database clusters on DigitalOcean. Moreover, view the connection URIs and database metadata of the selected cluster.

commands.name: search-domains
commands.title: Search Domains
commands.subtitle: DigitalOcean
commands.description: Search your domain records in DigitalOcean Networking, and copy the hostname or value of the DNS records. Moreover, create a new DNS record without leaving Raycast (requires write-access token).

commands.name: search-droplets
commands.title: Search Droplets
commands.subtitle: DigitalOcean
commands.description: Search your droplets in DigitalOcean, and view their IP addresses and metadata. Moreover, press Enter to view the droplet in the DigitalOcean console.

commands.name: search-kubernetes-clusters
commands.title: Search Kubernetes Clusters
commands.subtitle: DigitalOcean
commands.description: Search your Kubernetes clusters in DigitalOcean, and get the doctl command to connect to them. Moreover, view the cluster in the DigitalOcean console.

commands.name: search-projects
commands.title: Search Projects
commands.subtitle: DigitalOcean
commands.description: Search your projects in DigitalOcean, and go to them directly in your browser.
